entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Escort the AT-AT's to the Rebel shield generator, so that they may destroy it.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Manifest the might of the Empire by not letting any AT-AT's be destroyed.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Do not allow three or more additional AT-AT's to be destroyed. If the Empire losses a total of 4 or more Imperial Walker,  you will have much for which to answer.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Minor Casualties: Do Not Allow 3 More AT-AT's To Be Lost
